content.body: sffc: Should the proposal repo for NFv3 mention that it's at Stage-4, or is that not yet technically the case even though it was approved in January?
content.formatted_body: sffc: Should the proposal repo for NFv3 mention that it's at Stage-4, or is that not yet technically the case even though it was approved in January?

content.body:
> <@eemeli:mozilla.org> sffc: Should the proposal repo for NFv3 mention that it's at Stage-4, or is that not yet technically the case even though it was approved in January?

It's quite certainly stage 4, it's not merged into the spec yet but that doesn't matter so I'll make a PR to that explainer
